data.title: Kimi no Te wa Boku no Mono
data.title_japanese: きみの手はぼくのもの
data.synopsis: Anthology of six one-shots: 1. Kimi no Te wa Boku no Mono (Your Hand Belongs to me) - When his student Kurahashi-kun falls from the sky and lands on Sugisaki-sensei, everyone at school thinks they tried to commit suicide together! Sugiaki is determined to find out why Kurahashi would jump off a roof, but this may be too much for the doctor to handle! 2. Renai Sengen (Love Announcement) - When his son gets married and moves out businessman Sakurai Yuusuke is very lonely. When he finds a starving kid in front of his house, he takes him in. But who is his new house-keeper really? 4. Kira Kira Kiseki

data.title: Kiss wa Ichinichi Sando Made!?
data.synopsis: Yuzu has never had any girlfriend in his entire life. So when he starts going to college, he vows that he will find a beautiful girlfriend. But instead, he ends up getting the unwanted attention of 2 guys who are serious in making Yuzu their own (respectively). And so, what happens next?? (from B-U)

data.title: Shachou to Hisho
data.synopsis: In order to be closer to the person he admires, Udou applied for a job at the same company. Amazingly, he was accepted to work as the president's secretary. To his surprise, the very reason he applied isn't exactly who he expects him to be. (Source: MU)

data.title: Yukemuri Biyori♥Koi Meguri
data.title_japanese: 湯けむりびより♥恋めぐり
data.synopsis: Following in his mother's footsteps, Wataru became the onsen ryokan's male "hostess." Minato's love confession "I love Wataru!" has given the inn the reputation of Best Treatment for Love Relationships! Will Wataru, who is still learning his profession, react well to this passionate love attack? (Source: Liquid Passion)

data.title: Wagamama na Ningyo-sama
data.synopsis: Kanan has a boyish face and gets picked on often because of his tiny figure. But, things change when his gets neighbor turns out to be...a merman, and the king on the seas at that!?! Despite the king's selfish and rude pretense, he tries to booster Kanan's self esteem. Kanan wants to thank the merman for his support, but in what way...? (Source: DMP)

data.title: Keep Out
data.synopsis: Meet Takumi, a worker in the citizens' department of city hall, and beloved idol of the office. However, he's lived his life avoiding interaction with others. But what happens when a boy comes strolling into his heart? (Source: MU)

data.title: Anata ga Oshiete Kureta Koto
data.title_japanese: あなたが教えてくれたこと
data.synopsis: Teacher trainee Nakatsumi Tetsuya is popular with his students except for one - Sano Tomo, who seems to hate him and keeps on ignoring him. When Sano finally talks to him, he gives him advice as a teacher, but Sano suddenly grabs him and kisses him. (Source: MU)

data.title: Kafe Kara Hajimaru Love Life
data.title_english: Love Life which Begins from Cafe
title_synonyms: Love Life which Begins from Cafe
data.synopsis: The lovers’ refuge, Café Gem. There, the college student Kouta fell in love at first sight with the regular customer, Nanjyou. Due to unexpected events, he becomes a freeloader in Nanjyou’s house, and the daily heartthrob begins, but…!?

data.title: Yappari Kimi wo Suki ni Naru
data.title_japanese: やっぱり君を好きになる
data.synopsis: When student-teacher Noki runs into the art instructor Ishibashi, he falls in love at first sight. Braving thoughts of acting like a stalker, posing nude, and streaking through the hallways Natsukawa will do almost anything to see his love returned. (from B-U)

data.title: Yogoto Nayamashii Niwa de
data.synopsis: 1-4. A gardener (& phantom thief) steals lonely and rich boy's heart. 5. A little dark story about a host and a beautiful male prostitute. (Source: MU)

data.title: Pet wo Kaimashou
data.synopsis: Raising Your Pet: Hidaka Chikara, 17, goes onto the tv show "Fight Money" and swindles 5 million yen out of Kunimi Tomokazu, who is president of Keinou Productions. Chikara actually gives the money to his friend for his sick sister. But, how will he repay his debt? My Prince: Hayato's family volunteered to host a foreign exchange student, Edward Farring. A family emergency means Hayato is home alone and It's up to him to meet the guest at the airport and make him comfortable. However, it seems like the handsome Edward is not who he says he is. Who is this princely guy? (from B-U)

data.title: Tenshi no Tamago-ryouri
data.synopsis: The student Take begins to go to the cooking school for his father who lost his wife, but Take has no talent for cooking and he didn't make any progress. Then the teacher of the cooking school, Kurahashi is asked to come to Take's home to cook dinner for his father. But his father was a lover of Kurahashi who disappeared for ten years ago....) and one short shota story of doctors and his child patient. (Source: MU)

data.title: Kekkon Dekinai Otokotachi
data.synopsis: "How about a love relationship with me?" Felino Felice, fully staffed with gorgeous men, this restaurant is a secret haven known only to a few. One day, Kido Ryusei, an entrepreneur and a regular, becomes smitten with the waiter, Ichinose Kazuki. However, the stubborn Kazuki can’t be wooed in a conventional way. Only when Kazuki opens his heart will the pair have a chance for their love to blossom and grow… (Source: Fantasy Shrine)

data.title: Geboku ni Narimasu
data.synopsis: Moriya is in charge of finding a model for a new product commerical for a big jewelry brand; but, nobody matches the ideal of perfection he has in mind... That is, until he meets Itsuki Ouno. Itsuki is not just perfection incarnate, he's like royalty, and incredibly spoiled. And he may well be the one person destiny put in Moriya's way to fulfill his need to adore and serve. (Source: MU)

data.title: Ai no Bousou Ressha
data.synopsis: The world history teacher Kagami-sensei is very confident about his own charm. He is very famous person in school. Teachers, students and even strangers get shocked with love-struck when sees his beautiful face and every person in school recognize him. But what will happen when one of school students (Fujimaki) is not only not affected by his charm but he doesn't even know his name? What will Kagami-sensei do to get his attention? Will school-idol Kagami-sensei fall in love?

data.title: Secret
data.synopsis: Shuuji is a new teacher, but most of his worries don't stem from the stress at being in a new situation, but from the nightly visits of his lover Yuu -- a student at the same school. And Yuu has ... issues. (from B-U)

data.title: Violence na Kimi ga Suki
data.title_japanese: バイオレンスな君が好き
data.synopsis: A stupid & tall student, Myouenji, loves a small but delinquent student, Kuroda. Myouenji keeps stalking Kuroda though he knows Kuroda adores Masaki, a very cool guy. But soon after, Kuroda kisses Myouenji by mistake instead of Masaki... (Source: MU)

data.title: Ai ga Kami wo Korosu Toki
data.synopsis: On his trip to New York City, college student Takeru gets lost in the wrong part of town. He gets attacked, but is rescued by a man named Rei. Touched by Rei's kindness, Takeru can't help being attracted to him. But then Takeru discovers that Rei is the second-highest-ranking mafia man in New York City. Can love overcome such odds? (Source: M-U)
data.background: Ai ga Kami wo Korosu Toki was to be published in English as A Love That Conquers Gods by DramaQueen but was cancelled as the publisher went defunct.

data.title: Jinsei wa Bara Iro Da
data.synopsis: Miyamoto works for the sales division of a major insurance company. He's attracted to his cool and beautiful boss, Himuro. However, his courtship is thwarted by the return of the company president, Takarada. It's now become a three-way parley in a fierce battle for Himuro's affections! (Source: mangaupdates)

data.title: Kiss ja Tomaranai!
data.title_english: I can't stand only the kiss!
data.synopsis: Wataru and Makoto are friends from their early childhood. They are recognized as the gay couple in the school, and while Makoto appears to be ok with it, Wataru is greatly troubled by it and by Makoto's attitude. Since Wataru will not permit anything more than a kiss, the anxious Makoto visits his prep school teacher and tries to consult him about his problem. However, he's not aware of the danger that awaits him! (Source: MU)

data.title: Koi no Tsumeato
data.title_english: Scratch-marks of Love; Scratchmarks of Love
data.synopsis: Kou and his lover Ao have been together for years, but that doesn't stop Kou from cheating on his lover whenever he's had a bit too much to drink. Ao, deeply in love and infinately forgiving, always takes him back... but for how long? Tada Mikuni is totally Kou's type... and it doesn't hurt that he's an amazing chef! But when a case of mistaken identity lands them in the sack for a one-night stand, the two of them find out they hate just about everything about each other and never want to see each other again. Unfortunately, they're forced together again when Mikuni agrees to stand-in as the chef on a tv show for Kou's agency. Meanwhile, Ao knows something that neither of them realizes: it seems they've met before... (from B-U)

data.title: Zankoku Yuugi
data.synopsis: 1-3. Zankoku Yuugi (Cruel Game) 4-5: Kimi dake Kimi dake (Only You Only You)

data.title: Kabuki - Hana no Shou
data.synopsis: A 16th-century warlord and his page-boy commit suicide to avoid falling into the hands of the enemy and are reincarnated in present-day Japan. This series has ample wit, a good plot and some poignant moments. (from B-U)

data.title: Waru
data.synopsis: With a bad mouth and bad features, Jou, who's as evil as his outlook, is doing the biggest bad thing of his life. He's running away after kidnapping the son of the parliamentarian! During the thrill, the two of them have fallen in love. (from B-U)

data.title: Kamisama Shinkaron
data.synopsis: Yuto is a typical male high school student whose family is rooted from a long line of “onmyouji.” One day, while in the family storage house, he accidentally awakens a god who was sealed away hundreds of years ago. This god turns out to be extremely good-looking and possesses immense powers. Now, if only the said god remembered who he was! Stuck with a mysterious amnesiac god who’s strangely attached to him, Yuto ventures into the clamorous life between a high school and a god! (Soruce: Deux Press)
data.background: Kamisama Shinkaron's first volume was released in February 2005 and the second in October 2006, both published by Biblios. Although the first volume was reprinted in 2007 by Libre Shuppan, no further volumes have been published, so it is believed the series is currently on hiatus. The series was published in English as Oh My God! by Aurora under their Deux imprint from July 2008 to October 2008, only releasing 2 volumes. The series has been picked up by SuBLime since May 7, 2012.
